name: Throwaway Worlds: The Internal Monologue of a Doubtful Flat Earther
name_original: Throwaway Worlds: The Internal Monologue of a Doubtful Flat Earther
description:
SUMMARY

Throw globes in the ocean while listening to the internal monolgue of your character.

Lost Worlds + A First Person Shooter without Guns

ADDED/CHANGED IN v2.0

- locked the player's movement and camera in the menu screen

- Added a mouse sensitivity slider

- Added a volume slider for both the music and the narration

- Added a restart key to get back to the menu
